room_title: Escape room "Tesla's Mystery" by International Quests Escape Rooms in Philadelphia
room_description:
The greatest inventor and physicist of all time, Nicola Tesla was obsessed with the idea of wireless transmission of electricity. Unfortunately, the world never got to see his brilliant plan come to life. He may have been to busy to implement it, or just couldn't do it... Or maybe he could? But had no desire to share it, because the mankind was not ready then?
What was his secret? Maybe his laboratory holds the answers on his ambitious project destined to change the future? But don't expect this to be easy. Tesla's mystery will be hard to unravel, and you must channel your inner inventor!
